name: resilient-mailer
description: A robust email-sending service built in JavaScript that simulates real-world email dispatch infrastructure with built-in resiliency features like retries, fallback, circuit breaking, rate limiting, idempotency, logging, and a basic queue processor.

scripts.test: node tests/ratelimiter.test.js && node tests/idempotency.test.js && node tests/circuitbreaker.test.js
